The mother-in-law in the text actually still loves her daughter and hopes she can achieve lasting happiness, so she is somewhat concerned about the tense and strained emotional state between her daughter and her son-in-law. This mother will continue to prioritize the needs of her children or husband above all else, while placing her own needs in a secondary position. By contrast, the author's own mother, on the other hand, remains completely indifferent to matters concerning her sons. Not only does she not interfere in the affairs of her adult sons who need help, she has never even considered offering a helping hand herself.

Evaluation of the mother-in-law: She, too, has experienced certain emotional repression, which is why she secretly drinks a bit of strong liquor at her son-in-law’s home while taking care of her grandson, seeking to relieve stress. Evaluation of the mother: She is truly an extraordinary and unique person. I really can’t find any beautiful words to describe her—thank you for not being able to express it.
